com.sun.multicast.advertising
Interface AllAdvertisementsChangeListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface AllAdvertisementsChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener

AllAdvertisementsChangeListener interface. Allows classes to handle notification of arrival of a new Advertisement, or changes to or deletion or expiration of an existing Advertisement.

Method Summary
 void allAdvertisementsAdd(AllAdvertisementsChangeEvent ace)
          Interface for method to handle arrival of a new Advertisement.
 void allAdvertisementsChange(AllAdvertisementsChangeEvent ace)
          Interface for method to handle changes to an existing Advertisement.
 void allAdvertisementsDelete(AllAdvertisementsChangeEvent ace)
          Interface for method to handle deletion / expiration of an existing Advertisement.
